archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0724
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when a someone leaves me a voice message, I want to be able to visually see who called and what they said in the message in my app, so that I can quickly see if any action is required and save myself time having to call voicemail.

properties.value: Currently this integration is not included in the list. To be further discussed during AIF dedicated session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
